    • Method Detail

      • addWish

        public void addWish(java.lang.String itemid,
                    java.lang.String userid)
        Add an user to list of users wanting an item. If no users want it yet, create item key and add user. Make sure you ALWAYS call isItemWanted() before calling this else will error
        Parameters:
        itemid - - id of item that is wanted
        userid - - id of user that wants the item

      • removeWish

        public void removeWish(java.lang.String itemid,
                       java.lang.String userid)
        Remove an user from wanting an item. If after removing, no users want the item, delete item key. Make sure you ALWAYS call isItemWanted() before calling this else will error
        Parameters:
        itemid - - id of item that is wanted
        userid - - id of user that wants the item

      • removeItem

        public void removeItem(java.lang.String itemid)
        Remove itemid key from globalwishlist Make sure you ALWAYS call isItemWanted() before calling this else will error
        Parameters:
        itemid - - id of item that you want removed

      • isItemWanted

        public boolean isItemWanted(java.lang.String itemid)
        Return if an item is wanted by anyone
        Parameters:
        itemid - - id of item that is wanted
        Returns:
        Whether or not anyone wants the item

      • getFirstInterestedUser

        public java.lang.String getFirstInterestedUser(java.lang.String itemid)
        Return first userid who wants the item
        Parameters:
        itemid - - id of item that is of interest
        Returns:
        first userid of whoever wants the item

      • getAllInterestedUsers

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllInterestedUsers(java.lang.String itemid)
        Return all userids that wants the item Make sure you ALWAYS call isItemWanted() before calling this.
        Parameters:
        itemid - - id of first user that wants the item
        Returns:
        - arraylist of all users who want this item

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Return all userids that wants every item
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        - A string representation of all users who wants all items

      • getPersonWishlist

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getPersonWishlist(java.lang.String userid)
        Return all items in the user's personal wishlist Make sure you ALWAYS call isValidUser() before calling this.
        Parameters:
        userid - id of user who's wishlist is wanted
        Returns:
        arraylist of their wishlist

      • getInterestedItems

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInterestedItems(java.util.List<Item> allItems,
                                                           java.lang.String userB)
        Return all itemids of the items that are in userB's wishlist Make sure you ALWAYS call isValidUser() before calling this.
        Parameters:
        allItems - items in question
        userB - the user in question
        Returns:
        list of itemids of all the items that userB wants
